cemeteryFullAddress: 156 Lanark Road West, Edinburgh, City of Edinburgh, Scotland, United Kingdom
epitaph: Treasured Memories of A Much Loved Wife Mum & Granny CATHERINE S. McLENNAN Nee ATKINSON Died 23.6.91 Aged 68 Years and RODERICK McLENNAN A Dearly Loved Husband, Dad, Grandad & Great Grandad Died 1.5.13 Aged 89 Years
